price: Sε yewu na yεdane mfuturo a? (Onipa) bεsan aba (nkwa mu bio) no deε (εne nokorε ntεm) kwan ware paa.
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
